name: Cadofox 1k Sample Pack
description:
(note: Due to semi-recent events, I have decided to not longer continue on a certain website, so this is the official reupload. Future packs will also be sold on here as well)

We hit 1k followers on Soundcloud!

Thank you guys so much, we have grown so much since the beginning. I'm super excited to present you guys this pack as a token of my gratitude. Pack is completely free, but if you'd like to support me, any little bit is accepted. Hope you guys enjoy!

Pack features:

  • 6 Kicks
  • 6 Snares
  • 6 Ambience samples
  • 14 One Shots
